packages/ranvier-core-ts/src/SkillManage.description: SkillManager.find() uses indexOf(search) === 0 for prefix matching on skill.id. Second param is includePassive boolean filter.

packages/ranvier-core-ts/src/ItemManager.description: ItemManager.find(search, predicate?) implemented - uses indexOf(search) === 0 for name prefix matching with optional predicate filter

packages/ranvier-core-ts/src/MobManager..description: MobManager uses Map<string, Npc> keyed by uuid. Iterate over values() to access NPCs.
